sense.def:
To forgive someone
pomeni ne se več jeziti na osebo, ki je storila nekaj slabega.

seg.quote: I'll never forgive you for what you did.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da nekdo
could be forgiven for doing something
, hočemo povedati, da razumemo razloge za vedênje neke osebe.

seg.quote: We could be forgiven for thinking that we were still in London.
